mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name , o.organization_name , posi_detail.code_detail_name as positionName , d.doc_status , DATE_FORMAT(d.created_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS createdDate FROM user u INNER JOIN document d ON u.user_id = d.user_id INNER JOIN organization o ON u.organization_id = o.organization_id INNER JOIN common_code_detail posi_detail ON u.position_code = posi_detail.code_detail_number AND posi_detail.code_number = 'COM02' WHERE d.doc_id = #{docId}

SELECT a.doc_id , a.step_id , a.step_no , a.approver_id , u.user_name , a.status , position_cd.code_detail_name as positionName , c.code_detail_name AS status_description , a.created_id , a.created_date , a.updated_id , a.updated_date FROM approval_step a INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = a.approver_id INNER JOIN common_code_detail c ON a.status = c.code_detail_number AND c.code_number = 'APV01' -- 결재 상태 공통코드 INNER JOIN common_code_detail position_cd ON u.position_code = position_cd.code_detail_number AND position_cd.code_number = 'COM02' WHERE a.doc_id = #{docId}
